snippet: Although Standard & Poor’s raised its outlook for the United States’ debt rating, the stock market barely reacted.
abstract: Standard & Poor's ratings agency posts improved outlook for United States economy, but stock market barely reacts.
lead_paragraph: Although Standard & Poor’s raised its outlook for the United States’ debt rating, the stock market barely reacted.

headline.seo: Improved U.S. Debt Outlook Leaves Markets Unimpressed
